animes.title: Naruto
animes.synopsis: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the village leader.

animes.title: Attack on Titan
animes.synopsis: In a world where humanity resides within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans, giant humanoid creatures, Eren Yeager joins the fight to end their terror.

animes.title: My Hero Academia
animes.synopsis: In a world where nearly everyone has superpowers called Quirks, Izuku Midoriya, a Quirkless boy, dreams of becoming the greatest hero.

animes.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
animes.synopsis: Two brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, use alchemy to search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed attempt to bring their mother back to life.

animes.title: Death Note
animes.synopsis: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it, leading to a conflict with a mysterious detective.

animes.title: One Piece
animes.synopsis: Monkey D. Luffy, a boy with the ability to stretch like rubber, sets out with his pirate crew to find the ultimate treasure, One Piece, and become the Pirate King.

animes.title: Sword Art Online
animes.synopsis: In the near future, players of a virtual reality MMORPG find themselves trapped in the game, where dying in-game means dying in real life.

animes.title: Demon Slayer
animes.synopsis: Tanjiro Kamado, a kind-hearted boy, joins the Demon Slayer Corps to save his sister, who has been turned into a demon, and avenge his family.

animes.title: Cowboy Bebop
animes.synopsis: In the year 2071, bounty hunters known as 'Cowboys' travel in their spaceship, Bebop, as they hunt criminals and explore the galaxy.

animes.title: Dragon Ball Z
animes.synopsis: Goku and his friends defend the Earth from various villains, ranging from intergalactic space fighters and conquerors, unnaturally powerful androids, and nearly indestructible creatures.

animes.title: Bleach
animes.synopsis: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the abilities of a Soul Reaper and must protect the living world from dark spirits known as Hollows.

animes.title: Fairy Tail
animes.synopsis: Lucy Heartfilia joins the Fairy Tail Guild and embarks on magical adventures with her guildmates Natsu, Gray, Erza, and Happy.

animes.title: Hunter x Hunter
animes.synopsis: Gon Freecss discovers that his father, who he thought was dead, is actually a famous Hunter and sets out on a journey to find him.

animes.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
animes.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, teenager Shinji Ikari pilots a giant mecha to protect Earth from mysterious beings known as Angels.

animes.title: Tokyo Ghoul
animes.synopsis: Ken Kaneki, a college student, survives a deadly encounter with a ghoul and becomes part-ghoul himself, navigating a dangerous new world.

animes.title: Code Geass
animes.synopsis: Lelouch vi Britannia gains the power of Geass and leads a rebellion against the Holy Britannian Empire to avenge his mother and create a better world.

animes.title: Sword of the Stranger
animes.synopsis: A nameless samurai helps a young boy and his dog escape from pursuers, leading to a clash with a skilled Chinese warrior.

animes.title: Black Clover
animes.synopsis: Asta, a boy born without magic, aims to become the Wizard King with the help of his friends and his rare anti-magic abilities.

animes.title: Blue Exorcist
animes.synopsis: Rin Okumura, a teenager who discovers he is the son of Satan, enrolls at True Cross Academy to become an exorcist and fight against his fate.

animes.title: One Punch Man
animes.synopsis: Saitama, a superhero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, searches for meaning and excitement in his hero career.

animes.title: Steins;Gate
animes.synopsis: A group of friends who run a small-time laboratory develop a device that can send messages to the past, which brings them into conflict with a powerful organization.

animes.title: Your Lie in April
animes.synopsis: A piano prodigy who loses his ability to hear the piano after his mother's death is brought back to music by a spirited violinist.

animes.title: Clannad
animes.synopsis: A delinquent student and a strange girl meet and slowly form a close relationship while exploring their own personal struggles and those of their friends.

animes.title: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World
animes.synopsis: A young man is transported to a fantasy world where he gains the ability to return to a certain point in time whenever he dies.

animes.title: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works
animes.synopsis: Shirou Emiya, a young mage, becomes a participant in the Fifth Holy Grail War, a secret magical tournament where mages summon heroic spirits to fight.

animes.title: Mob Psycho 100
animes.synopsis: A powerful psychic middle schooler tries to live a normal life and keep his emotions in check, but his powers often make things difficult.

animes.title: Erased
animes.synopsis: A young man possesses the ability to travel back in time to prevent tragedies. When his mother is murdered, he is sent back to his childhood to prevent a series of kidnappings.

animes.title: The Seven Deadly Sins
animes.synopsis: A group of knights known as the Seven Deadly Sins must band together to overthrow tyrants and protect the kingdom.

animes.title: Akame ga Kill!
animes.synopsis: A young warrior joins an assassin group to overthrow a corrupt empire, facing various challenges and moral dilemmas.

animes.title: No Game No Life
animes.synopsis: Siblings Sora and Shiro, who are unbeatable gamers, are transported to a world where everything is decided by games.

animes.title: Toradora!
animes.synopsis: Ryuuji Takasu and Taiga Aisaka form an unlikely friendship to help each other with their respective crushes.

animes.title: Soul Eater
animes.synopsis: Students at the Death Weapon Meister Academy must collect the souls of evil humans to turn their weapons into Death Scythes.

animes.title: K-On!
animes.synopsis: A group of high school girls join the light music club and form a band, experiencing various comedic and heartfelt moments.

animes.title: Madoka Magica
animes.synopsis: A dark twist on the magical girl genre, where young girls make contracts to become magical girls but face unexpected consequences.

animes.title: Noragami
animes.synopsis: A minor god, Yato, strives to gain followers and become a major deity while dealing with his past and helping a human girl.

animes.title: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day
animes.synopsis: A group of childhood friends are reunited when the ghost of their deceased friend appears, asking for their help to move on.

animes.title: Elfen Lied
animes.synopsis: A girl with deadly telekinetic abilities escapes from a research facility and is taken in by two university students.

animes.title: Baccano!
animes.synopsis: Various events in 1930s America intertwine, involving immortals, gangsters, and a mysterious elixir of life.

animes.title: Trigun
animes.synopsis: Vash the Stampede, a gunslinger with a mysterious past, travels a desert planet while being pursued by bounty hunters and law enforcement.

animes.title: Gurren Lagann
animes.synopsis: Two young men from an underground village break free to the surface and fight against oppressive forces with the help of a giant robot.

animes.title: Angel Beats!
animes.synopsis: In a high school set in the afterlife, a group of students fight against a mysterious girl who wields supernatural powers.

animes.title: Gintama
animes.synopsis: In an alternate Edo period, a samurai and his friends take on odd jobs while dealing with alien invaders.

animes.title: Violet Evergarden
animes.synopsis: A former soldier reintegrates into society and becomes an Auto Memory Doll, helping others express their emotions through letters.

animes.title: Kill la Kill
animes.synopsis: A vengeful schoolgirl searches for her father's killer while wielding a sentient school uniform that gives her extraordinary abilities.

animes.title: Parasyte: The Maxim
animes.synopsis: A high school student battles parasitic aliens who take over human bodies while coexisting with a parasite that inhabits his hand.

animes.title: Yuri on Ice
animes.synopsis: A Japanese figure skater rediscovers his passion for the sport with the help of his idol and coach, Russian champion Victor Nikiforov.

animes.title: The Promised Neverland
animes.synopsis: Orphans discover the dark truth behind their orphanage and plan an escape to save themselves and the other children.

animes.title: Assassination Classroom
animes.synopsis: A class of misfit students is tasked with assassinating their alien teacher before he destroys Earth.

animes.title: Hellsing
animes.synopsis: The Hellsing Organization, led by Integra Hellsing, combats supernatural threats with the help of the powerful vampire Alucard.

animes.title: Nisekoi
animes.synopsis: Two high school students from rival yakuza families are forced into a fake relationship to maintain peace between their families.

animes.title: Death Parade
animes.synopsis: After death, people go to a bar where a bartender forces them to play games to reveal their true natures.

animes.title: Samurai Champloo
animes.synopsis: Two samurais and a girl search for a samurai who smells of sunflowers in a journey full of unique challenges.

animes.title: Cowboy Bebop
animes.synopsis: A group of bounty hunters travel in their spaceship, the Bebop, trying to capture criminals while dealing with their own pasts.

animes.title: Black Lagoon
animes.synopsis: A Japanese businessman joins a group of mercenaries called the Lagoon Company, who smuggle goods in and around Southeast Asia.

animes.title: Ergo Proxy
animes.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic future, a young woman investigates a series of murders involving androids and uncovers dark secrets about her world.

animes.title: Durarara!!
animes.synopsis: A young man moves to Ikebukuro and becomes involved in a series of strange events involving gangsters, supernatural beings, and secret organizations.

animes.title: Psycho-Pass
animes.synopsis: In a dystopian future, the justice system is governed by the Sybil System, which quantifies people's psychological states to determine their threat level.

animes.title: Spice and Wolf
animes.synopsis: A traveling merchant forms a partnership with a wolf deity as they travel through a medieval world seeking profit and understanding each other.

animes.title: Another
animes.synopsis: A boy transfers to a new school where he discovers a curse that leads to mysterious deaths among the students.

animes.title: Mushishi
animes.synopsis: A traveling expert in Mushi, ethereal creatures that embody the essence of life, helps people affected by them.

animes.title: Kaguya-sama: Love is War
animes.synopsis: Two genius students at an elite academy try to make the other confess their love first in a hilarious battle of wits.

animes.title: March Comes in Like a Lion
animes.synopsis: A young professional shogi player struggles with personal issues and relationships while trying to find his place in the world.

animes.title: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day
animes.synopsis: A group of childhood friends reunite to help the spirit of their deceased friend find peace and move on.

animes.title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
animes.synopsis: A high school boy gets dragged into the bizarre adventures of his eccentric classmate who can unconsciously alter reality.

animes.title: High School of the Dead
animes.synopsis: A group of high school students and their school nurse fight to survive a zombie apocalypse that has overwhelmed their city.

animes.title: Beastars
animes.synopsis: In a world of anthropomorphic animals, a mild-mannered wolf deals with his predatory instincts while navigating complex social dynamics.

animes.title: K-On!
animes.synopsis: A group of high school girls join the light music club and form a band, experiencing various comedic and heartfelt moments.

animes.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
animes.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, teenagers pilot giant robots to protect humanity from mysterious beings known as Angels.

animes.title: Nodame Cantabile
animes.synopsis: A talented but disorganized pianist meets a perfectionist aspiring conductor, and together they inspire each other's musical growth.

animes.title: Inuyasha
animes.synopsis: A modern-day girl is transported to the Sengoku period, where she meets a half-demon and embarks on a quest to collect the shards of a powerful jewel.
